dns_experimental module¶

This module is part of the nmeta suite running on top of Ryu SDN controller to provide network identity and flow metadata.

class dns_experimental.DNS(_config)¶

Bases: object

This class is instantiated by tc_policy.py and provides a method to parse a DNS packet

parse_dns(_dns_payload)¶

Parse a DNS payload. Return a dictionary of results
